name: Climbing Threshold #1
description:
As we move firmly into the Early Build Phase of this Climb Focussed training plan, we start the climbing threshold workout today. This is a climbing simulation session, but with a focus on working your ability to sustain your threshold powers. 



Producing and utilising lactate is a crucial focus of today's session.
